author: dependabot-preview[bot]
body:
Bumps [Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp](https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn) from 2.9.0 to 3.1.0.
Release notes *Sourced from [Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp's releases](https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/releases).* > ## Visual Studio 2019 Version 16.0 > ``` > Build Branch: dev16.0-vs-deps > Internal ID: Roslyn-Signed_20190320.1 > ```
Commits - [`9d80dea`](https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/commit/9d80dea7fe1b14043b9b2ac4d0b59ed26f508742) Merge pull request [#35740](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/dotnet/roslyn/issues/35740) from dotnet/merges/release/dev16.1-to-release/dev16... - [`1e993cf`](https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/commit/1e993cf895c7237c589344866246b1b1f47d7d9f) Merge pull request [#35733](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/dotnet/roslyn/issues/35733) from jasonmalinowski/fix-naming-style-ordering - [`7ac1772`](https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/commit/7ac177257a51891103c118044b26873e37673c44) Ensure we give .editorconfig keys in the same order as in the file - [`7f4a080`](https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/commit/7f4a08008f0fe7da66b9fafa215bb5446629357b) Rename EditorConfigStorageLocationTests since it was really testing something... - [`e38a60d`](https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/commit/e38a60d227db3b7715443c3380310aeda7dc9e8a) Merge pull request [#35712](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/dotnet/roslyn/issues/35712) from dotnet/merges/release/dev16.1-to-release/dev16... - [`04cca4a`](https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/commit/04cca4ae33580e63e12fc96550e571496d7217c6) Merge pull request [#35664](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/dotnet/roslyn/issues/35664) from gafter/dev16.1-35584 - [`794651d`](https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/commit/794651db45755f11bc4a15008d17b2de4266ab3f) Adjust tests per code review. - [`efa48d2`](https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/commit/efa48d248a3c601d889dc38ddb041f0fc1c04e45) Fix bug where pattern-matching treats a type parameter as if it is a referenc... - [`33cfe1a`](https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/commit/33cfe1a0905264d80633c5154de57de6c0bb94a0) Merge pull request [#35657](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/dotnet/roslyn/issues/35657) from dotnet/merges/release/dev16.1-to-release/dev16... - [`9361041`](https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/commit/93610417607fd05a3248b50453deabfc53ebf2b8) Merge pull request [#35616](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/dotnet/roslyn/issues/35616) from genlu/FixCommit - Additional commits viewable in [compare view](https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/compare/version-2.9.0...version-3.1.0)

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://api.dependabot.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp&package-manager=nuget&previous-version=2.9.0&new-version=3.1.0)](https://dependabot.com/compatibility-score.html?dependency-name=Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp&package-manager=nuget&previous-version=2.9.0&new-version=3.1.0) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) --- **Note:** This repo was added to Dependabot recently, so you'll receive a maximum of 5 PRs for your first few update runs. Once an update run creates fewer than 5 PRs we'll remove that limit. You can always request more updates by clicking `Bump now` in your [Dependabot dashboard](https://app.dependabot.com).
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot ignore this [patch|minor|major] version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor/major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot badge me` will comment on this PR with code to add a "Dependabot enabled" badge to your readme Additionally, you can set the following in the `.dependabot/config.yml` file in this repo: - Update frequency (including time of day and day of week) - Automerge options (never/patch/minor, and dev/runtime dependencies) - Pull request limits (per update run and/or open at any time) - Out-of-range updates (receive only lockfile updates, if desired) - Security updates (receive only security updates, if desired) Finally, you can contact us by mentioning @dependabot.

comments.author: dependabot-preview[bot]
comments.body:
OK, I won't notify you again about this release, but will get in touch when a new version is available.

If you change your mind, just re-open this PR and I'll resolve any conflicts on it.

title: Build(deps): Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp from 2.9.0 to 3.1.0
